descriptionHtml:
A simple re-colour of jojjo\'s awesome Silverlight Armor, with white feathers and light yellow-green gems. 
Gorgeous bling!

I have left out the Circlet as I don\'t use it. I \'ll try to remember to work on that soon. 
The gems were actually re-textured using photos of opals, but it isn\'t all that visible because of the glow. 
I canâ€™t remove the  (jarring to my eyes) glow from the gems or tone down the brightness of the armour. 
I would appreciate any help here, this is the first time I have done this kind of work. 

INSTALLATION

Install Silverlight Armor by jojjo :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251

This tweak is done on the files from the Chainmail version of the armour. I have no idea if it will be compatible with the skimpy version. 

Then go to Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Silverlight and drop the contents of the zip file there, overwrite/replace all. 

IF YOU LIKE IT, SAY THANKS OR CLICK THE ENDORSE BUTTON

And of course, thank & endorse jojjo if you haven\'t already!


UNINSTALLATION
Just re-install jojjos\' mod. 


NEXT: Blacklight !

UPDATE: No black armor is possible to me, the glow of the armor seems coded in either in the mesh files or the esp file and without removing I cannot get the results I want. jojjo hasn\'t offered any info on wheere the glow of the gems and armor is coming from, so I\'ll abandon this idea for now.
